FuncDef: Theno advertise-localoption prevents the advertisement of any locally defined I-VPLS ISIDs or static-isids in the range in a B-VPLS. For I-VPLS services or static-isids that are primarily unicast traffic, the use-def-mcast and no advertise-local options allows the forwarding of ISID based multicast frames locally using the default multicast. Theno advertise-localoption also suppresses this range of ISIDs from being advertised in ISIS. When using theuse-def-mcastandno advertise-localpolicies, the ISIDs configured under thisstatic-isiddeclarations SPBM treats the ISIDs as belonging to the default tree.
